item.title: Obsessed with Eye Floaters? Read This.
item.description:
If you searched for this, you probably already know:

This isn’t about vision anymore.
It’s about obsession.

You’re not just seeing floaters —
You’re thinking about them constantly.
And you’re exhausted.

Let’s fix that.

Step One: Stop Pretending You’re Fine

Let’s call it what it is:

You’re in a mental loop.
You’re scanning for them without meaning to.
You’re researching, checking, avoiding light, panicking quietly.

It doesn’t mean you’re weak.
It means your brain flagged a visual glitch as a threat, and now it won’t shut off the alarm.
